pages.text: $(weapon)Fire Aspect$() sets your target on fire when you hit them!$(br2)Deals $(important)additional fire damage over time$() and cooks food-dropping mobs.

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(FF4500)Blaze Rod$() grants $(weapon)Fire Aspect +2$()$(br2)Bring the heat of the Nether to battle!

pages.title: Fire Duration
pages.text: $(li)Level 1: Burns for 4 seconds$(li)Level 2: Burns for 8 seconds (Blaze Rod)$(li)Level 3: Burns for 12 seconds$(li)Level 4+: Even longer burns!$(br2)Each level adds 4 seconds of fire. Damage continues even after you stop attacking.

pages.title: Special Features
pages.text: $(li)Cooks chicken, beef, pork automatically$(li)Great for food collection$(li)Damages most mobs$(li)$(important)Be careful$() - doesn't work on Nether mobs!$(li)Can make PvP harder to track$(br2)$(o)Some like it hot!$()
